Akhaltsikhe.title: Akhaltsikhe
Akhaltsikhe.byline: Akhaltsikhe (Georgian: ახალციხე, "New Fortress") is a small city of about 18,000 people (2014) and the capital of Samtskhe-Javakheti.

Akhty.title: Akhty
Akhty.byline: Akhty is a beautiful mountain village of about 15,000 people with a historic quarter and museum in Dagestan.

Akhfenir.title: Akhfenir
Akhfenir.byline: Akhfenir (also Akhfennir, Sidi Akhfenir and Sidi Akhfennir) is a small town in Tarfaya Province, Morocco.

Akhalkalaki.title: Akhalkalaki
Akhalkalaki.byline: Akhalkalaki is a town in the Samtskhe-Javakheti region of Georgia.
